text: Benjamin Vermeulen (born 15 July 1957) is a former Belgian racing cyclist. He rode in the 1980 and 1981 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:People from Sint-Niklaas Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from East Flanders
title: Benjamin Vermeulen
